results.title: Anti-atherosclerotic effect of simvastatin depends on the presence of apolipoprotein E.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to compare the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ levels, @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001018 @@@aortic lesions@@@ in these two models of experimental @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang YX, Martin-McNulty B, Huw LY, da Cunha V, Post J, Hinchman J, Vergona R, Sullivan ME, Dole W, Kauser K. Anti-atherosclerotic effect of simvastatin depends on the presence of apolipoprotein E. Atherosclerosis. 2002 May;162(1):23-31. PMID: 11947894

results.title: Effects of aggressive versus conventional lipid-lowering therapy by simvastatin on human atherosclerotic lesions: a prospective, randomized, double-blind trial with high-resolution magnetic resonance imaging.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Using a double-blind design, newly diagnosed @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (n = 51) with asymptomatic @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001018 @@@aortic@@@ and/or carotid @DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaques@@@ were randomized to 20 mg/day (n = 29) or 80 mg/day (n = 22) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Corti R, Fuster V, Fayad ZA, Worthley SG, Helft G, Chaplin WF, Muntwyler J, Viles-Gonzalez JF, Weinberger J, Smith DA, Mizsei G, Badimon JJ. Effects of aggressive versus conventional lipid-lowering therapy by simvastatin on human atherosclerotic lesions: a prospective, randomized, double-blind trial with high-resolution magnetic resonance imaging. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2005 Jul 5;46(1):106-12. PMID: 15992643

results.title: Atheroma stabilizing effects of simvastatin due to depression of macrophages or lipid accumulation in the atheromatous plaques of coronary plaque-prone WHHL rabbits.
results.text_hl: Finally, fully differentiated smooth muscle cells increased in the @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001018 @@@aortic lesions@@@ of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

results.title: Hypercholesterolemia Up-Regulates the Expression of Intermedin and Its Receptor Components in the Aorta of Rats via Inducing the Oxidative Stress.
results.text_hl: Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ascorbic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001205 @@@vitamin C@@@ ameliorated the @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001018 @@@aortic injury@@@, decreased the plasma @GENE_ADM2 @GENE_399475 @@@IMD@@@ level, and recovered the expression of @GENE_ADM2 @GENE_399475 @@@IMD@@@ and its receptors within the aorta.

citations.NLM: Meng Q, Shi D, Feng J, Su Y, Long Y, He S, Wang S, Wang Y, Zhang X, Chen X. Hypercholesterolemia Up-Regulates the Expression of Intermedin and Its Receptor Components in the Aorta of Rats via Inducing the Oxidative Stress. Ann Clin Lab Sci. 2016 Winter;46(1):5-17. PMID: 26927337
